channel.title: Arriviste - Instant PK - Stable - Great economy
channel.description:
[SIZE=3][FONT=Lucida Console][COLOR="#FF0000"]Welcome to Arriviste thread, We will be offering 3 different game modes, Iron-Man, Hardcore Iron-Man and Normal game-play; There will also be options for you to select one of the pre-made kits.
The pre-made kits consist of 3 options, Pure, Zerker and Hybrid. With those being added the items which come with the kits , the items ofcourse will become invaluable and worthless, thus keeping the economy clean[/COLOR].[/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][COLOR="#B22222"]Arriviste Jar:[/COLOR][url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/j9q6fckwx0x73wt/Arriviste.jar]Arriviste[/url][/SIZE] I have domain, but it's not ready to use yet.
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/1b69a4a51197208edf1e377bb84f2615.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/32f532ead461096019e1ed68bff8ad43.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/9d0e9a375d2d12ae4157fe2ac151fd7c.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/baf36b1dacd9c6a22f5204969670312d.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/9f4242cf67cca37859ce98809bf7b9a6.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/82f62886b89c7914862fb605f3c8f46a.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/56e29352a5968f78ba3155440480a908.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/d2ca0fecd1d64da9501aab9f663110aa.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/3f543d1e2887fdf35ff7bb76d22a27ce.png[/img]
More media will be added soon.
[/SPOILER]
[ul][COLOR="#800080"] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Fully working God-wars.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Fully working Solo and Team Dungeoneering.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Several unique places to pk.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]20+ bosses to enjoy killing alone or with friends.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Fully working mini-games such as Fight Caves, Custom Graveyard arena, Fight pits and more.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Fully working Grand Exchange.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Over 100+ working achievements to obtain to grant you access to the almighty Completionist cape.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Custom prestige shop and prestige system.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Fully working summoning with familiars and scrolls.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Fully working slayer including access to all dungeons and 4 various slayer masters.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Custom in-game emoji's.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]100% Clan chat system with loot share.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]100% Bank features such as deposit all, bank tabs, etc.[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"] Star Sprite shop including depleting Shooting Stars[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Pre-made kits [/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Pure, Hybrid or Zerker pre-made sets and stats for instant PKing[/COLOR] [*] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Great Economy[/COLOR][/COLOR][/ul]
[CENTER]
[SIZE=4][COLOR="#800080"] Credits:[/COLOR][/SIZE] Swiffy - Source Nexile - For improving Swiffy's source Me - For Fixing more bugs..
[B][COLOR="#FF0000"]ALL HATE WILL BE REPORTED to MODS[/COLOR][/B][/CENTER]

item.description:
@jakob88 wrote:

[SIZE=3][FONT=Lucida Console][COLOR="#FF0000"]Welcome to Arriviste thread,
We will be offering 3 different game modes, Iron-Man, Hardcore Iron-Man and Normal game-play; There will also be options for you to select one of the pre-made kits.

The pre-made kits consist of 3 options, Pure, Zerker and Hybrid.
With those being added the items which come with the kits , the items ofcourse will become invaluable and worthless, thus keeping the economy clean[/COLOR].[/FONT][/SIZE]

[SIZE=5][COLOR="#B22222"]Arriviste Jar:[/COLOR]Arriviste[/SIZE]
I have domain, but it’s not ready to use yet.
